projects.name: üìä Campaign Performance Aggregation API
projects.description: Designed and implemented a scalable REST API that aggregated advertising campaign metrics from multiple sources, standardized the data model, and delivered real-time performance insights. Improved data retrieval latency and enabled unified reporting for downstream analytics tools.

projects.name: üåê Personal Portfolio Website (the one you're currently viewing)
projects.description: Created a responsive and visually appealing personal portfolio website to showcase my projects, skills, and experience. Implemented smooth animations and transitions using Framer Motion, and styled the site with Tailwind CSS for a modern look.

projects.name: Expense Tracker Application
projects.description: Developed a single-page application for managing income and expenses. Users can add and delete transactions (income/expense), annotate them with notes, and get a live-updating account balance. Built using React.js, JavaScript, HTML and CSS, and deployed on GitHub Pages.
